paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Of the 29 patients enrolled, 26 completed the study.
Of the 29 patients enrolled, 3 were unaffected.

functional_data.summary: Patisiran demonstrated significant knockdown rates of TTR levels.
assays: Norfolk Quality of Life-Diabetic Neuropathy questionnaire

variants.additional_notes: The variant is associated with both neuropathy and cardiomyopathy.
key_quotes: The most common point mutation associated with ATTR polyneuropathy is Val30Met.
Patisiran demonstrated suppression of both wild-type and mutated TTR in patients with the p.Val50Met mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was consistent and clear from the text.
